heading: HR00794
0: RESOLUTION URGING THE DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION (DOTr), TOLL REGULATORY BOARD (TRB), DIFFERENT STAKEHOLDERS AND TOLLWAY OPERATORS OF DIFFERENT TOLLWAYS AND EXPRESSWAYS IN LUZON TO COME UP WITH A MECHANISM UNDER A MEMORANDUM OF AGREEMENT (MOA) OR MEMORANDUM OF UNDERSTANDING (MOU) FOR AN INTEGRATED AND SINGLE UNIFIED TICKETING  PAYMENT SCHEME BY USING ONLY ONE (1) RADIO FREQUENCY IDENTIFICATION (RFID) STICKERS CALLED "EASY DRIVE" IN ALL THE TOLLWAYS AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
status: Pending with the Committee on TRANSPORTATION since 2017-02-22
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00794
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION URGING THE DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION (DOTr), TOLL REGULATORY BOARD (TRB), DIFFERENT STAKEHOLDERS AND TOLLWAY OPERATORS OF DIFFERENT TOLLWAYS AND EXPRESSWAYS IN LUZON TO COME UP WITH A MECHANISM UNDER A MEMORANDUM OF AGREEMENT (MOA) OR MEMORANDUM OF UNDERSTANDING (MOU) FOR AN INTEGRATED AND SINGLE UNIFIED TICKETING PAYMENT SCHEME BY USING ONLY ONE (1) RADIO FREQUENCY IDENTIFICATION (RFID) STICKERS CALLED "EASY DRIVE" IN ALL THE TOLLWAYS AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : CALIXTO-RUBIANO, EMI G.
DATE FILED : 2017-02-15
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Tambunting (097 2017-05-31)2. Violago (009 2017-08-09)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON TRANSPORTATION ON 2017-02-22
